channel.title: Discover More on
channel.description: Recent content in Discover More on

item.title: Contribution
item.description: We are open for all contributions regarding our wiki page at https://nrchkb.github.io/ If you want to contribute consider opening discussion first before creating PR. Structure At content/wiki you will find folders for our wiki sub categories. Introduction General how to pages and articles not fitting rest of categories. Examples Node-RED examples (working or semi-working flows) that can be used by new users to start a journey with nrchkb. Service and Characteristic HomeKit’s services and characteristics can be found here.

item.title: Credits
item.description: This is a place where would like to thank those who have come before to build the work that we have added to. Where the Project came from The API work to interact between HomeKit and NodeJS is from HAP-NodeJS. Marius Schmeding made the first version of the Node-RED plugin to use HAP-NodeJS. His work was later forked by Oliver Rahner who put in a good effort to move over to bridged connections to HomeKit.
